amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to require universities, nonprofits, and businesses who receive Federal grants to comply with the light bulb ban.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Energy to require grant recipients to replace any lighting that does not meet or exceed the energy efficiency standard set forth in section 325 of the Energy Policy and Conservation Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
